title: I Can't Fix You
desc:
Post 2134
- You may also play this if someone gets **Destroyed.**
- For every **Destroyed** player, discard 3 cards. If no players are out of the game, you may give **Everyone** an **Injury** and **Banish** all cards that remove **Injuries** to swap hands with the player in 1st place, or discard to 2 cards if you are in 1st place.
